cw-log-analyzer.title: Log Analyzer with CloudWatch Logs
cw-log-analyzer.description: Use when debugging or investigating issues that would likely benefit from CloudWatch log introspection. Search and filter CloudWatch Logs, find error patterns, and correlate log events across multiple services.

pg-postgres-mcp-ro.title: PostgreSQL MCP Pro (Read-Only)
pg-postgres-mcp-ro.description: PostgreSQL tuning and analysis server. Provides index tuning, explain plans, health checks, and safe SQL execution. Read-only with resource limits.

pg-postgres-mcp-rw.title: PostgreSQL MCP Pro (Read-Write)
pg-postgres-mcp-rw.description: PostgreSQL tuning and analysis server. Provides index tuning, explain plans, health checks, and safe SQL execution. Full read/write access for development.

aws-iac.title: AWS Infrastructure as Code
aws-iac.description: Use when building or troubleshooting AWS infrastructure as code. Validate CloudFormation templates, check compliance, search CDK documentation, get best practices guidance, and debug deployment failures.

google-sheets.title: Google Sheets
google-sheets.description: Use when you need to read, create, or modify Google Sheets spreadsheets. Search for spreadsheets, read/write cell data, manage sheet tabs, add rows/columns, apply batch updates, share spreadsheets, and browse Drive folders.

pulsemcp-playwright.title: Playwright
pulsemcp-playwright.description: Use when you need to automate browser interactions or scrape pages. Execute Playwright code, take screenshots, and manage persistent browser sessions with optional stealth mode.

ecs-mcp.title: Amazon ECS
ecs-mcp.description: Use when monitoring or troubleshooting ECS deployments. Check deployment status, fetch service events and task failures, pull task logs, detect image pull failures, and inspect network configuration.

pulsemcp-dynamodb-ro.title: DynamoDB (Read-Only)
pulsemcp-dynamodb-ro.description: Use when you need to inspect DynamoDB tables and data without modifying anything. List and describe tables, get items, query, scan, and batch get.

pulsemcp-dynamodb-rw.title: DynamoDB (Read-Write)
pulsemcp-dynamodb-rw.description: Use when you need to read and write DynamoDB items. List/describe tables, get/put/update/delete items, query, scan, and batch operations. No admin (create/delete table) access.

pulsemcp-s3-ro.title: AWS S3 (Read-Only)
pulsemcp-s3-ro.description: Use when you need to browse or read S3 data. List buckets and objects, download object contents, and check bucket existence. Read-only â€” no writes, deletes, or bucket creation.

pulsemcp-s3-rw.title: AWS S3 (Read-Write)
pulsemcp-s3-rw.description: Use when you need full S3 access. List, read, upload, copy, and delete objects. Create and delete buckets. Use S3_BUCKET to constrain to a single bucket.

chrome-devtools-remote.title: Chrome DevTools (Remote)
chrome-devtools-remote.description: Use when you need to inspect or debug a page already open in Chrome. Connects to a running Chrome instance via --remote-debugging-port. Take screenshots, inspect network requests, read console logs, run scripts, and profile performance.

chrome-devtools-headless.title: Chrome DevTools (Headless)
chrome-devtools-headless.description: Use when you need a standalone headless Chrome for automated browsing, screenshots, network analysis, and performance profiling. Launches its own Chrome instance with no visible window.

neon-remote-ro.title: Neon Postgres (Remote, Read-Only)
neon-remote-ro.description: Use when you need to safely inspect Neon Postgres databases. Run SQL queries, list projects and branches, check schemas, and analyze performance without risk of accidental modifications.

neon-remote-rw.title: Neon Postgres (Remote, Read-Write)
neon-remote-rw.description: Use when you need to manage Neon Postgres databases. Create and manage projects, branches, and databases, run SQL queries, and perform branch-based migrations.
